item.title: Are You Making This Common Spelling Mistake With 'November'? Find Out Now!
item.description: Introduction to November November is the 11th month of the year, and its name comes from the Latin novem, meaning “nine”. November is a time of change, with the leaves falling from the trees and the days getting shorter. It’s also a time for reflection, with Thanksgiving and other holidays. But what about the spelling of November? It’s a common mistake to spell it incorrectly, so let’s take a closer look at this mistake and how to avoid it.
